name: linker-utilization
description: The long run process to trend machine's cpu, mem and disk usage
preInstallNotes: We recommend at least 0.1 CPUs and 512MB of RAM for each linker-utilization instance.
postInstallNotes: Linker-utilization LinkerDC/OS Service has been successfully installed!
postUninstallNotes: Linker-utilization LinkerDC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
